Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{3: 'When all had ended, Bianca took Toniris back to Babylonia.'}
{3: 'A few days later.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Purifying Force, Bianca reporting.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Here you are.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'After you brought Toniris back... We found more testers to continue with the experiments.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "But Toniris' response level is far below ideal.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I\'m quoting Allen here. "Maybe Toniris has already found itself a master."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "That's why I want to hear more details from you.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "I see. So that's what happened.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "That's why I said we shouldn't incorporate too many bionic elements in tactical equipment. Toniris apparently has a poor affinity with anyone but Bianca.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'This issue must be addressed seriously from the next unit onward.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Admittedly, Toniris' combat data and synchronization broke all current records in that battle.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'But it is a piece of tactical equipment after all. If it can only reach its full potential with certain individuals, such equipment is flawed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Our mission is to make equipment that can be fully utilized by all combatants.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "But... Like what I just said, Toniris' potential could be fully realized under certain conditions.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "That's why I want you to bring Toniris whenever possible during your missions.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I will never ignore outstanding performance and potential. If you can collect enough data during the collaboration with Toniris...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Then perhaps we may be able to reach the same synergy again. This does not contradict our purpose.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Are you saying that... Toniris and I can fight together from now on?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Correct. And it is your duty to record and analyze the data of every single battle.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Alright, let's go meet Toniris.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{3: 'Toniris was standing in the center of the artificial courtyard.'}
{3: 'Quiet and calm as always.'}
{3: 'It was born to help creatures who could not live alone, to teach them the skills they needed to survive.'}
{3: 'Yet they saw it as different until it was buried in the wasteland.'}
{3: 'But now, it had a visitor who was very similar to itself.'}
{3: "She has expanded Toniris' world."}
{3: 'For some reason, Toniris knew she would visit her once again.'}
{3: '—And she would make its world more complete.'}
